scenario_text.value:
It’ll be bad if we get separated again. We
need to lock this down together...

Aren’t we in a hurry? Then we ought to split
up and cover more ground!

He’s right, we can’t leave Shuuji alone when
he’s like that. We have to find him soon.

It’ll be okay! If another fake shows up, we
can just beat them ourselves!

Then let’s split up and look for Shuuji. It’s
up to us, guys!
